ComicInfo.Summary:
Trapped by a force-field, Solar is under attack by the Eggbreakers! But Geoff no longer feels that Solar is the "Sun Demon" he fears will destroy the world. So, as Solar strives not to hurt the misguided Eggbreakers, Gilad convinces Harada to call off the attack. Now, Solar and Geoff go to the home of Erica Pierce, only to find that she has been murdered by her superhuman counterpart from the world Solar destroyed!
1st appearance:
- Jolt
- Quell
- Sponge
- Albert Pierce (1st full appearance)
